articles.title: Nicotine may not prevent coronavirus infection, WHO cautions - The Hindu
articles.description: A review of studies found that smokers are more likely to develop severe disease with COVID-19, compared to non-smokers, says a statement by the global health body
articles.content: Urging researchers, scientists and the media to be cautious about amplifying unproven claims that tobacco or nicotine could reduce the risk of COVID-19, the World Health Organisation on May 11 issued a statement saying there is insufficient evidence to confir… [+3271 chars]
